title: ALLIANCE ENERGY

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with ALLIANCE ENERGY. The average
  contract duration was 0.77 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.1M.
  The longest contract was 4.99 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $14.1M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '15'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '20%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '14%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '5.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '2.8M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.77'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.1M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '4.99'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '14.1M'
